Desc.eng: This strange creature has a point, you know. I almost feel bad now.

I know you! You are that annoying monster-slayer who fills these tunnels with piles of corpses! Bet you never think about us poor sods who have to clean up your mess! Work, work,work, without a bite to eat!
He said that he was hungry. Maybe I could offer him something to eat…
Don’t waste my time. Go on, do the job you were created for.
My, my! A kind soul after all! That’s a first. You know what? I’ll show you a secret tunnel that leads to a hidden part of the sewers.
